prompt_base: photograph of a short, stout alien-looking android, dark magenta/purple smooth skin, large vibrant green rimless sunglasses, oversized dark hat, wearing a sharp black tuxedo, stoic expression
feature_prompt: RAW photo, 8k dslr, cinematic lighting, highly detailed smooth skin texture, subtle imperfections, sharp focus on glasses lenses and hat brim, textured tuxedo fabric
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, CGI, plastic texture, rubber skin, shiny artificial face, flat color, low quality, deformed face shape, blurry hat
